issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Hi All,

Following release:

{code}
euca2ools-3.1.0-0.0.165.20140331git697a0826.el6.noarch
eucalyptus-imaging-worker-image-1.0.0-0.130.140404git9cb1782.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-4.0.0-0.0.834.20140407git71f6fa95.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-common-java-libs-4.0.0-0.0.834.20140407git71f6fa95.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-admin-tools-4.0.0-0.0.834.20140407git71f6fa95.el6.noarch
eucalyptus-sos-plugins-0.1.5-0.el6.noarch
eucalyptus-load-balancer-image-1.0.4-0.193.140404git92bfbc9.el6.x86_64
eucaconsole-4.0.0-0.1.0.228.20140404git66bddbe9.el6.noarch
eucalyptus-common-java-4.0.0-0.0.834.20140407git71f6fa95.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-cloud-4.0.0-0.0.834.20140407git71f6fa95.el6.x86_64
{code}

Setup:

1) DB+Backend
2) UFS+OSG+Riak-cs
3) CC/SC (overlay)
4) NC

Use-case:
Register a paravirt image and except imaging worker to convert it to bootable disk. 

Imaging worker fails with error in the log saying:

{code}
2014-04-07 11:50:49,400 worker [INFO]:Querying for new imaging task
2014-04-07 11:50:49,400 boto [DEBUG]:Using access key provided by client.
2014-04-07 11:50:49,400 boto [DEBUG]:Using secret key provided by client.
2014-04-07 11:50:49,400 boto [DEBUG]:Using security token provided by client.
2014-04-07 11:50:49,401 boto [DEBUG]:Method: POST
2014-04-07 11:50:49,401 boto [DEBUG]:Path: /services/Imaging/
2014-04-07 11:50:49,401 boto [DEBUG]:Data: 
2014-04-07 11:50:49,401 boto [DEBUG]:Headers: {}
2014-04-07 11:50:49,402 boto [DEBUG]:Host: 169.254.169.254
2014-04-07 11:50:49,402 boto [DEBUG]:Port: 80
2014-04-07 11:50:49,402 boto [DEBUG]:Params: {'InstanceId': 'i-836754b8', 'Action': 'GetInstanceImportTask', 'Version': '2014-02-14'}

xmlns="http://www.eucalyptus.com/ns/imaging/2014-02-14/"><importTaskId>import-is-c8240bf7</importTaskId><importTaskType>convert_image</importTaskType><instanceStoreTask><accountId>784535429661</accountId><accessKey>AKILCON0QNMSPHQA9QEW</accessKey><uploadPolicy>eyJleHBpcmF0aW9uIjoiMjAxNC0wNC0wOVQxMTo0Mjo1Ni44NjhaIiwiY29uZGl0aW9ucyI6W3siYnVja2V0IjogImV1Y2EtaW50ZXJuYWwtZ21zNTktbHVjaWQtcm9vdGZzIn0sWyJzdGFydHMtd2l0aCIsICIka2V5IiwgImx1Y2lkLXNlcnZlci1jbG91ZGltZy1hbWQ2NC5pbWciXSx7ImFjbCI6ImVjMi1idW5kbGUtcmVhZCJ9XX0=</uploadPolicy><uploadPolicySignature>TkH98x4rF0GYKf+oGU2R8t5mDNw=</uploadPolicySignature><s3Url>http://10.104.1.212:8773/services/objectstorage</s3Url><ec2Cert></ec2Cert><serviceCertArn>arn:aws:iam::784535429661:server-certificate/euca-internal/euca-internal-imaging-service</serviceCertArn><importImageSet><item><id>eki-15ebf4bb</id><format>KERNEL</format><bytes>4150752</bytes><downloadManifestUrl>http://imaging@10.104.1.212:8773/services/objectstorage/89193a-download-manifests/DM-lucid-server-cloudimg-amd64.img-KERNEL?Expires=1396889449&AWSAccessKeyId=AKILCON0QNMSPHQA9QEW&Signature=3%2FJUHjJkfMTx34qxXn951lbuTnA%3D</downloadManifestUrl></item><item><id>eri-bd300039</id><format>RAMDISK</format><bytes>4268240</bytes><downloadManifestUrl>http://imaging@10.104.1.212:8773/services/objectstorage/89193a-download-manifests/DM-lucid-server-cloudimg-amd64.img-RAMDISK?Expires=1396889450&AWSAccessKeyId=AKILCON0QNMSPHQA9QEW&Signature=k4YF0Hg%2FQ0Xa%2By1ox0GDTe7edGw%3D</downloadManifestUrl></item><item><id>emi-31690639</id><format>PARTITION</format><bytes>1476395008</bytes><downloadManifestUrl>http://imaging@10.104.1.212:8773/services/objectstorage/89193a-download-manifests/DM-lucid-server-cloudimg-amd64.img-PARTITION?Expires=1396889450&AWSAccessKeyId=AKILCON0QNMSPHQA9QEW&Signature=X8Yge7rGlxvpfEyEZ3c7I0ZpLO0%3D</downloadManifestUrl></item></importImageSet><convertedImage><bucket>euca-internal-gms59-lucid-rootfs</bucket><prefix>lucid-server-cloudimg-amd64.img</prefix><architecture>x86_64</architecture></convertedImage></instanceStoreTask></GetInstanceImportTaskResponse>
2014-04-07 11:50:50,233 worker [ERROR]:Failed to query imaging service: [Errno 13] Permission denied: '/var/lib/eucalyptus/keys/cloud-cert.pem'
{code}

The file does not exist inside the imaging worker VM:

{code}
[root@ip-10-105-3-1 eucalyptus-imaging-worker]# ls -ltrh /var/lib/eucalyptus/keys/
total 0
[root@ip-10-105-3-1 eucalyptus-imaging-worker]# ls -ltrhd /var/lib/eucalyptus/keys/
drwx------. 2 eucalyptus eucalyptus 4.0K Apr  4 22:33 /var/lib/eucalyptus/keys/
{code}

Log in backend shows:

{code}
2014-04-07 04:45:10  WARN | A task (import-is-c8240bf7:i-836754b8) is gone missing [BUG in worker script]
2014-04-07 04:45:40  WARN | A task (import-is-c8240bf7:i-836754b8) is gone missing [BUG in worker script]

2014-04-07 04:48:15  WARN | A task (import-is-c8240bf7:i-836754b8) is gone missing [BUG in worker script]
2014-04-07 04:48:46  WARN | A task (import-is-c8240bf7:i-836754b8) is gone missing [BUG in worker script]
2014-04-07 04:49:17  WARN | A task (import-is-c8240bf7:i-836754b8) is gone missing [BUG in worker script]
2014-04-07 04:49:47  WARN | A task (import-is-c8240bf7:i-836754b8) is gone missing [BUG in worker script]
2014-04-07 04:50:18  WARN | A task (import-is-c8240bf7:i-836754b8) is gone missing [BUG in worker script]
2014-04-07 04:50:49  WARN | A task (import-is-c8240bf7:i-836754b8) is gone missing [BUG in worker script]
2014-04-07 04:51:20  WARN | A task (import-is-c8240bf7:i-836754b8) is gone missing [BUG in worker script]
{code}

Please let me know if you have any further questions.

Cheers!
Deependra
fields.summary: imaging worker task fails due to permission denied

comments.body:

[root@odc-d-06-02 ~]# euca-describe-images 
IMAGE	eki-15ebf4bb	784535429661/lucid-kernel	784535429661	available	private	x86_64	kernel				instance-store

{code}
sosreport from backend and imaging worker VM attached with this ticket for further information.
I fixed the issue by copying the keys from backend to imaging worker VM and then changing owner/group of /var/lib/eucalyptus inside working VM to imaging-worker:imaging-worker

Now after the imaging worker VM completed the task if I run an instance from the paravirt image which is now shown as "available" I see following error in the backend logs

{code}
2014-04-07 05:03:53  INFO | :1396872233053:Address:ADDRESS_STATE:TOP:Address 10.104.3.12 arn:aws:euare:000000000001:user/nobody available 0.0.0.0  AddressTransition system:unallocated->impending(true)
2014-04-07 05:03:53 ERROR | Got an error
com.eucalyptus.util.EucalyptusCloudException: Failed to read manifest file: euca-internal-gms59-lucid-rootfs/lucid-server-cloudimg-amd64.img.manifest.xml
        at com.eucalyptus.imaging.manifest.BundleImageManifest.getManifest(BundleImageManifest.java:65)
        at com.eucalyptus.imaging.manifest.ImageManifestFile.getManifest(ImageManifestFile.java:39)
        at com.eucalyptus.imaging.manifest.DownloadManifestFactory.generateDownloadManifest(DownloadManifestFactory.java:114)
        at com.eucalyptus.imaging.manifest.DownloadManifestFactory.generateDownloadManifest(DownloadManifestFactory.java:79)
        at com.eucalyptus.images.Emis$BootableSet.populateVirtualBootRecord(Emis.java:325)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.run.Allocations$Allocation.getVmTypeInfo(Allocations.java:446)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.run.ClusterAllocator.setupVmMessages(ClusterAllocator.java:471)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.run.ClusterAllocator.<init>(ClusterAllocator.java:241)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.run.ClusterAllocator.<init>(ClusterAllocator.java:162)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.run.ClusterAllocator$SubmitAllocation$1.call(ClusterAllocator.java:201)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.run.ClusterAllocator$SubmitAllocation$1.call(ClusterAllocator.java:197)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:262)
        at com.eucalyptus.system.Threads$Queue.run(Threads.java:682)
        at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Executors.java:471)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:262)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1145)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:615)

dup of a story that is in progress
